v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, He is mine! and naught of earthly things, Not all the charms of pleasure, wealth or power, The fame of heroes, or the pomp of kings, Could tempt me to forgo His love an hour. Go, worthless world, I Cry, with all that’s thine! Go! I my Savior’s arm, and He is mine.{/lang-eng}
